climbs.name: What’s Your Name?
climbs.fa: Jordan Braswell, Will Avent, Zach Chambliss

content.description: Bouldery start (crux) off the ground. To stance an gear  in dirty pockets.  Continue moving up until you can traverse right to the anchors
content.protection: Need a number 4 to protect the traverse at the top an smaller gear down low.
content.location: on Separate buttress behind the cave buttress an climbers right of Paul’s boutique. Look for low first bolt an double bolt anchor.

climbs.name: Step up to the Mic
climbs.fa: Paul Rothfeldt, Matt Smith, Josh Odom   FFA Matt Smith

content.description: Middle route on the wall. Punch through tiny holds and balancy moves for two bolts.  Move up 20 more feet on easy ground to another bolt.  One last easier crux to a sizeable runout trending up and right. Cool gear placement in a water groove.  Run it through bulges with good gear to a double bolt anchor at the top. Shares anchors with Egg Man.
content.protection: Standard rack, 3 bolts, one large piece (#4) is recommended.

content.description: Big slabby offwidth.  Fun climbing and a great way to start the day!
content.protection: Doubles from .4 to 3 an one number 4 will sew it up very tight.  Two bolts at the top slab to anchors avoid the gully.

content.description: Start with a bouldery move to the first and only bolt.  Move up and left through poor feet and small pro to a crack system where the difficulty lessens.  Aim left through bulges to the anchors on top of the cliff. Shares anchors with Step up to the Mic.
